text: Herot mba ndɨkndɨgar Zisas ga mbuav, ana bigi vhɨrver anan nzaŋgi. Ana mba nzambarir Zisas ga mbuim, Zisas ana buna thuen ŋgarkarigi fhuvara. 23.9 Kha gumgi, mbe khar Zisas ga sav ana nzuai buni, nta guigira buni guari fhuvara. Zisas, ana mba khesharigi tɨva thaneŋ ga muuŋgi, zakɨra fhuvara. Mbe mba bunin ana nzuaim, ana wo mbevav fhura mbe piin kav, ana maaŋ muuŋgiap mbe ŋgarka thagi.
